alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 8:25AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A DAM RELEASE REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central Arizona, including the following county, Maricopa. * WHEN...Until 500 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of unbridged crossings across the Salt and Gila Rivers is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 824 AM MST, water releases from Tempe Town Lake continue to decrease, however these releases are still impacting low water crossings in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... El Mirage Road near Avondale, agricultural and industrial interests along and within the Salt and Gila river beds. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
